HediffDef.label: cogno-berserker
HediffDef.description: An installed cogno-berserker implant. Grants movement and attack speed on taking damage.

ThingDef.label: cogno-berserker
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that monitors behavior for sudden and severe shifts. On detecting a mental break, it begins stimulating nocireceptors to cause increasing pain. Once this knocks out the host, it can then proceed to induce a coma during which enable recalibration of the host's mental processes. This coma will expire approximately four horus after the keeper stops inducing pain.

HediffDef.label: artificial rage
HediffDef.description: A temporary state of enhanced physical performance induced by a cogno-berserker implant.

HediffDef.label: cogno-censor
HediffDef.description: An installed cogno-censor implant. Prevents the host from slighting or insulting others, instead worsening the host's mood whenever such a social interaction would be made.

ThingDef.label: cogno-censor
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that detects targeted aggression and activity in Broca's area. When both of these kinds of neural activity flare, it disrupts the synapses to produce a transient state of aphasia, preventing the host from coherently formulating or uttering slights or insults. While this disruption does not cause permanent physiological damage, it is known to frustrate hosts and cause negative changes in mood.

ThingDef.label: cogno-interpreter
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that assists in the detection of syntactic and conceptual structures in language, as well as with plastic mapping of symbols to definitions. It makes reading easier and can assist in translation, even with machine languages.

HediffDef.label: cogno-straitjacket
HediffDef.description: An installed cogno-straitjacket implant. Causes increasing pain while social fighting or in the throes of a mental break; once the host is incapacitated, it also induces a short-term coma. The coma will expire approximately four hours after the keeper stops inducing pain.

ThingDef.label: cogno-straitjacket
ThingDef.description: A brain implant that monitors behavior for sudden and severe shifts. On detecting a mental break, it begins stimulating nocireceptors to cause increasing pain. Once this knocks out the host, it can then proceed to induce a coma during which enable recalibration of the host's mental processes. This coma will expire approximately four horus after the keeper stops inducing pain.

HediffDef.label: cogno-straitjacket coma
HediffDef.description: A temporary, benign coma induced by a cogno-straitjacket implant.

ThingDef.label: cogno-preserver
ThingDef.description: A brain implant which uses high-density data storage to routinely store copies of technical knowledge. By routinely transmitting modulated versions of this knowledge to the organic brain, it can slow the gradual loss of technical skills.

ThingDef.label: animals autotrainer
ThingDef.description: An ultratech implant which continually trains the animals skill. Unlike a single-use mechanite skilltrainer, the autotrainer passively generates experience over time by routinely enforcing a pre-templated neural pattern.

ThingDef.label: artistic autotrainer
ThingDef.description: An ultratech implant which continually trains the artistic skill. Unlike a single-use mechanite skilltrainer, the autotrainer passively generates experience over time by routinely enforcing a pre-templated neural pattern.

ThingDef.label: archotech skill hoarder
ThingDef.description: A brain implant which greatly slows the loss of technical knowledge by means utterly unknown to mortal minds.
